content: update 11/11/22 i have uploaded an updated pattern to fix errors it also has instructions to make the bear s ears update 10/31/22 for the body there is an error instead of r13 - 15 single_crochet-30 sts it should be r11 - r13 single_crochet-30sts and subsequent row should be renumbered accordingly i ll update the pattern soon i came up with this pattern during the time when our baby astro was very sick from intervertebral disc disease and paralysis i sat with him for 7 days and nights and crocheted to pass the time i finished this bunny while he was still with us he has since passed away and i decided to write down the instructions for the pattern in his memory please feel free to download and make lots of hippy s for your enjoyment and in memory of anyone you love i ask that you don t use this pattern for commercial purposes i m now crocheting another hippy to test/correct any errors in the pattern and will post an update when i m done i will also update the pattern with the exact positions to sew on the ears arms and embroider the face features
